entry.data:
SUNNY
NOT AS COOL WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS AROUND 70
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY
THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHEAST AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
